articles.title: Honor X10 will feature Sony’s 40MP IMX600y sensor, X10 Pro comes with periscope lens - Gizchina.com
articles.description: According to a recent leak, the Honor X10 has a triple-camera setup led by Sony's 40MP IMX600y sensor. The X10 Pro comes with a periscope camera.
articles.content: After many rumors and leaks, it’s official the Honor X10 and X10 Pro are coming in the next week. Interestingly enough, Honor decided to publish some photo samples ahead of the launch. Despite the images, there’s still missing details about the camera setup. … [+1295 chars]
